name: Clown'n
description:
CLOWN'N AROUND TOO MUCH WILL GET YOU MELTED!!

GO ON A 3D CLOWN ADVENTURE - OPEN WORLD LEVELS SO EXPLORE AS MUCH AS YOU WANT!

WATCH OUT - THE FLOOR IS LAVA SO BE CAUTIOUS!

COLLECT COINS EVEN SEARCH FOR THE GIANT ICE CREAM CONE TO COMPLETE LEVELS!

ON SCREEN SMOOTH CONTROLS - EQUIPPED FOR UNIVERSAL PLAY!

NO ADS OR IN APP PURCHASES PERFECT FOR ALL AGES!
